attributes.action: speak the truth about members and their false claims and stop acting as an apolgist for members who have been well and truly caught with their fingers in the till.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Again, today at PMQ, Gordon Brown said that members on all sides 'have made mistakes' over their expenses claims.  These members HAVE NOT MADE MISTAKES.  These members have been found out to have INTENTIONALLY AND SYSTEMATICALLY been embezzling and defrauding the taxpayer and it is about time Gordon Brown acknowledged the truth and said so while stood at the Despatch Box - if he has the honour and integrity to ever speak the truth.  If he believes he is to ever again to have ANY credibility with the british voters this is something he has to do!

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
